actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provision of law which prohibits the importation into the United States of certain fur skins which are the product of the Soviet Union or Communist China.

summary.text: Repeals the provision of the Tariff Schedules of the United States which prohibits the importation into the United States of furskins which are the product of the Soviet Union or Communist China.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of law which prohibits the importation into the United States of certain fur skins which are the product of the Soviet Union or Communist China.
